channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: 'Scammers' impersonate Crypto Twitter users on Threads as users near 100M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Threads are already seeing potential crypto scammers arrive on the platform as Crypto Twitter personas warn of impersonators on the app.

item.title: Rush for Hong Kong’s crypto licenses yet to translate to jobs: Recruiters
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Hundreds of firms have been lining up for a Hong Kong crypto license, but recruiters say they are yet to see an accompanying rush for talent.

item.title: Canada's court deem 👍 emoji valid as a contract agreement: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The case sought to determine whether a Canadian farmer had agreed to sell tons of flax to a grain buyer in 2021 by replying with a thumbs-up emoji.

item.title: Bitcoin price gathers strength as SOL, AVAX, FIL and EOS prep for a breakout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: SOL, AVAX, FIL and EOS price are beginning to look attractive, especially if Bitcoin opens the week with a renewed attack on the $31,000 level.

item.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. invested up to $250,000 in Bitcoin after Miami's conference
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The recent investment disclosure contrasts with his claims in May that he was not an investor in Bitcoin.

item.title: BlackRock ETF stirs US Bitcoin buying as research says 'get off zero'
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is a must-own as the world's only truly scarce asset, analysis argues, as U.S. BTC accumulation takes a leg up.

item.title: How to land a high-paying job as an AI prompt engineer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover the essential steps, skills and strategies needed to land a lucrative career in the rapidly growing field of AI customization and fine-tuning.

item.title: XRPL grows in Q2 despite SEC lawsuit concerns: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The XRP Ledger saw a significant increase in the total new address count, which reached 138,790, representing a growth of 31.8% compared with the same period in 2022.

item.title: Multichain attack triggers Twitter phishing scheme for FTM distribution
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: A phishing link was included in the tweet and shared with the affected users of the hack, leading them to believe it was associated with the Fantom Foundation.

item.title: Salvadoran teenager becomes Bitcoin teacher, no longer earning ‘6 dollars a day’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: In a series of tweets, 18-year-old Gerardo Moran explained his journey back to his former high school in El Salvador, where he is now teaching senior professors about Bitcoin.

item.title: Marathon Digital blames weather conditions for mining 21% less Bitcoin in June
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The transition from spring to summer in Texas has been a major factor in Marathon Digital’s 21% decline in Bitcoin mined in June, according to a statement.

item.title: BlackRock bullish on Bitcoin, Gemini CEO’s ‘delusion,’ and CEXs’ unhappy staff: Hodler’s Digest, July 2-8
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: BlackRock’s PR campaign for a Bitcoin ETF, Gemini’s fight with DCG over Earn program funds, and CEX employees’ sentiment.

item.title: Circle, Tether freezes over $65M in assets transferred from Multichain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Multichain has suspended its operations after an unexplained transfer of crypto assets worth millions of dollars took place on July 6.

item.title: What is prompt engineering, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore the concept of prompt engineering, its significance, and how it works in fine-tuning language models.

item.title: Coinbase was aware of securities law violations, SEC claims in letter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: According to the SEC, Coinbase recognized the probability that federal securities laws would apply to its operations, openly informing its shareholders about the risk.

item.title: What is The Graph, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tanuj Surve
item.description: The Graph is an indexing protocol for Web3 applications that organizes blockchain data to make it easily accessible with GraphQL..

item.title: Crypto Biz: Winklevoss slams Silbert, Twitter’s double-edged sword and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz also explores Gemini’s fight with the Digital Currency Group over user funds, new banking tools for the digital yuan, and OpenAI’s efforts to stop users from jumping paywalls.

item.title: AI tool revolutionizes brain tumor treatment by guiding surgeons: Study
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Although the tool’s accuracy may not match current genetic tests, it can swiftly predict a tumor’s profile.

item.title: Ripple Labs to revolutionize real estate industry through tokenization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: An innovative pilot program aims to enable users to tokenize real estate assets and utilize them as collateral for loans, leveraging Ripple’s CBDC platform.

item.title: ZachXBT’s research cited in Canadian NFT rug pull class-action lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: According to court documents, the Boneheads team has been accused of breach of contract, misappropriating funds and misleading investors.

item.title: Over $765K worth of NFTs stolen after SIM swap attack on Gutter Cat Gang
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The bad actors used a fake Gutter Cat Gang airdrop scam to drain people’s wallets, with at least $700,000 worth of NFTs stolen from a single address.

item.title: Coinbase domain name reportedly used by scammers in high-profile attacks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Twitter users have been sharing security incidents surrounding the crypto exchange, including claims that scammers are using Coinbase’s domain name for attacks.

item.title: Open-source advocates launch OP Stack testnet to fund public goods
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Public Goods Network from Gitcoin promises to redirect most net sequencer fees into public goods instead of giving them to tokenholders or developers.

item.title: 3 reasons why Bitcoin’s price is primed to hold the $30,000 level as support
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin’s price has been showing weakness near the $30,000 level, but multiple data points highlight the fact that bears remain at a disadvantage.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Crypto.com petitions US court to uphold arbitration decision for mistakenly sent $50K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The exchange said it “erroneously deposited” $50,000 into a user’s account in June 2022, receiving no response to requests to return the funds.

item.title: DeFi ‘circuit breaker’ could slash hack losses by 70%: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had a mixed week. Most tokens traded in the same range as the previous week, with a minor bearish correction.

item.title: Elon Musk’s lawyers respond to motion to kick Tesla team off Dogecoin case: ‘Waste of this court’s time’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The strongly worded legal filing comes in response to an attempt to have Tesla’s lawyers sanctioned over supposed conflicts of interest and alleged misconduct.

item.title: Ether price charts reflect weakness, but inflow to LSDFi could prevent an ETH sell-off
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: ETH price still struggles to conquer the $2,000 level, but growth in LSDFi could prevent a sharper sell-off.

item.title: BIS develops framework against CBDC cyberattacks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The institution cited rising exploits against DeFi as a need for more secure CBDCs.
